title: Trichotomy for the orbits of a hypercyclic operator on a Banach space
abstract:
We obtain a trichotomy for the orbits of a hypercyclic operator $T$ on a
separable Banach space $X$: (1) every vector is mean asymptotic to zero; (2)
generic vectors are absolutely mean irregular; (3) every hypercyclic vector is
mean divergent to infinity. Examples of weighted backward shifts on $\ell^p$
show that all three cases can happen.
